title: Tech Moves: Microsoft CFO joins EA; Greater Seattle Partners’ hires CEO; and more - GeekWire
content: Tech Moves: Microsoft CFO joins EA; Greater Seattle Partners’ hires CEO; and more  GeekWire
description: — Electronic Arts (EA) announced Chris Suh as its new CFO effective March 1. Suh is currently CVP and CFO of the cloud and AI group at Microsoft. He has spent more than 25 years at Microsoft…
